function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited cooperation between different departments, hospitals, and institutions","Impact":"Impedes integrated management in combatting a pandemic","Mitigation":"Establishment of collaborative platforms for information monitoring and sharing","Technologies":"Smart solutions for information sharing and monitoring","People":"Different departments, hospitals, and institutions","Owner":"Government and organizational leaders"},{"Description":"Fragmented governance and limited cooperation between different sectors and levels of governance","Impact":"Conflict and difficulty in combatting a pandemic","Mitigation":"Promotion of open, transparent, and accountable leadership, and building partnerships","Technologies":"Smart solutions for integrated planning and management","People":"Government officials and leaders at different governance levels","Owner":"Government and organizational leaders"},{"Description":"Cities not well prepared for prevailing viruses despite having smart infrastructure","Impact":"Inability to cope with the virus effectively","Mitigation":"Development of emergency plans and preparedness strategies","Technologies":"Smart infrastructure for data analysis and emergency response planning","People":"Residents and local authorities","Owner":"Local government and emergency management agencies"}]}
